title: Possessive Professor
description: I know what I'm doing is wrong, but that isn't going to stop me. I want her. I need her, more than anything. Remi Tanton turned my world upon its side the very moment she stepped foot into my classroom. I knew by the look in her doleful, hazel eyes that she needed saved and I'm determined to be the one who saves her. No matter how wrong it is, it feels right...- THIS IS A STANDALONE SHORT STORY -
author: Kinley Cole
